page.title: 11Clubs & Sports in the Block
page.content: Mowsley has{clubs}for Badminton,men's keep-fit,young people and ponies.For other sporting activities various villages and towns are visited;Market Harborough for ballet,swimming and squash,Evington for swimming,Kibworth and Lutterworth for tennis.Leicester is occasionally visited for any of the above sports.Laughton and nearby Gumley both have{cricket pitches,}and water-sports are catered for at Rutland water.Many children have swimming lessons other than as part of their schooling. There are scout and cub packs at Fleckney for boys, and Brownies at Kibworth and Husband's Bosworth for girls.A few adults belong to the Conservative Club in Market Harborough.The{Women's Institute}have branches in Mowsley,Gumley and Saddington.
